settings.rtl_languages_info: Input the language codes to show languages in RTL layout. All codes must follow [ISO Language Code Table](https://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_language_codes.asp) and separated using commas (Ex: ar,fa,ps)

inventory_status.low_stock_threshold_info: A whole number between 0 and 200 is recommended for setting the low stock threshold for stock countdown.
inventory_status.in_stock_message_info: Personalize the inventory status message on the product card and product information. Use {qty} in the message to show the current product stock (E.g. Only {qty} items left)
inventory_status.low_stock_message_info: Personalize the inventory status message on the product card and product information. Use {qty} in the message to show the current product stock (E.g. Only {qty} items left)

enable.label: Enable
enable.info: When product is out of stock, please make sure 'Continue selling when out of stock' is enabled in Shopify admin > Product detail page.
enable.option_3: When product is out of stock

comparison.paragraph: This feature enables the comparison of products, not variants. To customize the fields for comparison, modify the 'Product comparison' section in the Overlay group. Preview the outcomes on a Collection or Search page.
comparison.enable_info: Add "Add to Compare" buttons to product cards (collection, search pages), and product page to compare product information and metafields in a single grid.

settings.paragraph: Applies for product cards in all pages

show_inventory_status.label: Show inventory status
show_inventory_status.info: Selecting "Product sold" does not reflect the realtime inventory drop of the product. You must create a product metafield with the exact key "custom.product_sold" and fill in a custom number to show as the number of product sold.

sale_labels.paragraph_1: You can use these codes in the content:
sale_labels.paragraph_7: {count_down} for count down timer to end date. (Must enable schedule)

highlight_attributes.paragraph: Create product or variant metafields of Single line text type to show product highlighted features on product cards.

estimated_delivery_date.paragraph_1: You can use these codes in the message:
estimated_delivery_date.paragraph_2: earliest_delivery_date to show earliest delivery date.
estimated_delivery_date.paragraph_3: latest_delivery_date to show latest delivery date.
estimated_delivery_date.paragraph_4: delivery_duration to show the number of days left until delivery
estimated_delivery_date.paragraph_5: time_to_cut_off to show the amount of time left before cut-off time

overlay.show_quick_add_info: Add to cart right from product cards without opening quick view popup or going to the product page.

general.info: The settings below automatically add color swatches to the filter in collection and search page.
general.replace_color_with_variant_images: Replace color options with variant images

product_card.text_option_name_info: Fill in the name(s) of the option used as text swatch, phrases of different languages are separated by a semicolon (E.g. Size; Taille).
product_card.swatches_color_shown_by_default_info: Select 0 to show all available swatches on product cards.
product_card.swatches_text_shown_by_default_info: Select 0 to show all available swatches on product cards.

filter.info: To filter using additional color or image values, create metaobjects and metaobject references, then change the settings below as per your preferences. [Learn about showing visual filters using metaobjects.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters#visual-filters)

search_results.show_link: Show link to search results page

default.popular_search_terms_info: Recommend most searched terms in your store to customers, separated using a comma (E.g. t-shirt, running shoes,...)

speech_search.enable_info: Speech search is only available on Chrome for desktop or Android (will not work on iPhone).

search_exclusion.paragraph: Exclude collections from in-store search and automatic recommendations.

settings.favicon_image_info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32 px

settings.custom_payment_icons_svg_info: Customize your payment icons. For example, fill in this field your chosen methods: apple_pay, google_pay, tabby, tamara. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/themes-by-shopify/vintage-themes/customizing-vintage-themes/add-credit-card-icons#edit-the-code-for-your-payment-icons)
settings.enable_discount_code_field_info: In case a free shipping code is applied, the discounted shipping fee will be reflected only in checkout page.

cart_custom_field.enable_custom_field_info: "Field label" must be filled in to enable custom field.
cart_custom_field.validation_regex_info: For field validation purpose. Please avoid using it if youâ€™re not familiar with Regex. For assistance with Regex or fixing issues that arise from it, please [contact our support](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).

cart_upsell.paragraph_1: If enabled in mini cart and cart page, upsell recommendations can be shown following this priority (from high to low):
cart_upsell.paragraph_2: (1) by creating a product metafield in cart upsell and this field is not blank. [See our user guide for further details.](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/maximize-theme-settings/cart)
cart_upsell.paragraph_3: (2) by selecting a list of products manually in the settings below
cart_upsell.paragraph_4: (3) by using dynamic recommendations based on Shopify product recommendations. [Learn more.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)
cart_upsell.product_info: If you use a product metafield to add upsell products, leave this field blank.

settings.enable_info: Show Reorder button from customer account and customer order pages

free_shipping.order_amount_info: Enter the rules for order amount(s) to qualify for free shipping (one rule per line). Format instructions and examples are as follow:
free_shipping.paragraph_1: amount (100) for orders from any country and currency without individually defined amount.
free_shipping.paragraph_2: currency code:amount (USD:100) for orders from any country using USD without individually defined amount.
free_shipping.paragraph_3: country code:currency code:amount (US:USD:100) for any orders from the US with the currency USD.

estimated_shipping_rates.paragraph: Display the estimated shipping cost at mini cart and cart page based on customer's address.

edt.min_day_info: The minimum number of days needed to ship all orders. Use a semicolon to differentiate between shipping markets if needed (e.g. US:6;GB:3), or fill in one number to apply for all available markets. Country codes should follow [ISO 3166 standard.](https://www.iban.com/country-codes)
edt.min_day_paragraph: To customize for each product, create a metafield with the key 'custom.delivery_date_min' and type 'Text'. [Learn more about creating metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields) or [contact our support](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).
edt.max_day_info: The maximum number of days needed to ship all orders. Use a semicolon to differentiate between shipping markets if needed (e.g. US:6;GB:3), or fill in one number to apply for all available markets. Country codes should follow [ISO 3166 standard.](https://www.iban.com/country-codes)
edt.max_day_paragraph: To customize for each product, create a metafield with the key 'custom.delivery_date_max' and type 'Text'. [Learn more about creating metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields) or [contact our support](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).

show_in_cart.label: Show in cart
show_in_cart.info: Show estimated delivery time under each item in cart, checkout page and order details.

edt_in_cart.paragraph: To customize message for each product, create a metafield with the key 'custom.delivery_date_message ' and type 'Rich text'. [Learn more about creating metafields.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields)
edt_in_cart.message_paragraph_1: You can use these codes in the message:
edt_in_cart.message_paragraph_2: earliest_delivery_date to show earliest delivery date.
edt_in_cart.message_paragraph_3: latest_delivery_date to show latest delivery date.

settings.custom_icon_info: For assistance with custom SVG code or fixing issues that arise from custom SVG code, please [contact our support](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).

settings.paragraph: Show your market currency as a single entity in the currency selection, rather than showing specific countries individually.

currency_codes.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

custom_code.html_for_head_tag_info: Used for any custom HTML code to apply site-wide. Placed at the bottom of the <head> tag on all theme pages, except for checkout page.
custom_code.paragraph: For support with handling custom code or fixing issues related to custom code, please [contact us](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).

settings.show_original_collection_url: Show original collection URL for canonical tags
settings.show_original_collection_url_info: Show original URL for paginated collection pages as canonical tags.

business_info.info: Used to show in site's structured data and on Google's SERP graph card. Learn more about [organization schema](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/appearance/structured-data/organization).
business_info.address_info: Fill the address by order (all fields are optional): street address, address locality, address region, postal code, address country code. E.g: Rue Improbable 99,Paris,Ile-de-France,75001,FR
business_info.other_address_info: Provide multiple addresses if you have locations in multiple cities, states, or countries.
